Get traits measured from a single trial via BrAPI

getTraitsFromSingleTrial.Rd

Queries the BrAPI /search/variables endpoint for a given trial and returns a data frame of traits and their DbIds measured in that trial

Usage

getTraitsFromSingleTrial(study_id, brapiConnection, verbose = F)

Arguments

study_id

A single studyDbId to query germplasm for.

brapiConnection

A BrAPI connection object, typically from BrAPI::createBrAPIConnection(), with a $search() method.

verbose

Logical; if TRUE, print messages about the retrieval process.

Value

A data frame of traits for the given trial, with one row per trait Columns include observationVariableDbId and observationVariableName. If no result is found, not sure what happens...

Examples

brapiConn <- BrAPI::createBrAPIConnection("wheat-sandbox.triticeaetoolbox.org", is_breedbase = TRUE)

traits_df <- getTraitsFromSingleTrial("8128", brapiConn)
traits_df
#> # A tibble: 18 × 2
#>    observationVariableDbId observationVariableName                              
#>    <chr>                   <chr>                                                
#>  1 85465                   Aboveground biomass at maturity - g|CO_321:0501159
